name: Arm Joe
description:
Arm Joe, also known as ArmJoe, is a free 2D one-on-one fighting dōjin game based on the Les Misérables musical.[1]

It was made by Takase using 2D Fighter Maker (2D格闘ツクール95, 2D Kakutō Tsukūru 95), an engine developed by OUTBACK (ＯＵＴＢＡＣＫ) and edited by ASCII (アスキー, Asuki).

Takase is also known for creating Dot Fighters.
